snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg, the billionaire former mayor of New York City, has a new job: United Nations special envoy for cities and climate change.
abstract: United Nations announces that former New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg will serve as UN special envoy for cities and climate change.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg, the billionaire former mayor of New York City, has a new job: United Nations special envoy for cities and climate change.
